trans-unit.source: Linux tutorial: Get started with Hadoop and Hive | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Linux tutorial: Get started with Hadoop and Hive | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Follow this Linux tutorial to get started using Hadoop in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Follow this Linux tutorial to get started using Hadoop in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to provision Linux clusters, and query data with Hive.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to provision Linux clusters, and query data with Hive.

trans-unit.source: Hadoop tutorial: Get started using Linux-based Hadoop in HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Hadoop tutorial: Get started using Linux-based Hadoop in HDInsight

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: [Windows](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md)
trans-unit.target: [Windows](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md)

trans-unit.source: [Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started.md)
trans-unit.target: [Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started.md)

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create Linux-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight, and use Ambari Hive View to run Hive jobs.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create Linux-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight, and use Ambari Hive View to run Hive jobs.

trans-unit.source: If you are new to Hadoop and big data, you can read more about the terms: [Apache Hadoop](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510084), [MapReduce](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510086), [Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510087), and [Hive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510085).
trans-unit.target: If you are new to Hadoop and big data, you can read more about the terms: [Apache Hadoop](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510084), [MapReduce](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510086), [Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510087), and [Hive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=510085).

trans-unit.source: To understand how HDInsight enables Hadoop in Azure, see [Introduction to Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-introduction.md).
trans-unit.target: To understand how HDInsight enables Hadoop in Azure, see [Introduction to Hadoop in HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-introduction.md).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before you begin this tutorial, you must have:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin this tutorial, you must have:

trans-unit.source: **Azure subscription**: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: **Azure subscription**: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: Create cluster
trans-unit.target: Create cluster

trans-unit.source: Most of Hadoop jobs are batch jobs.
trans-unit.target: Most of Hadoop jobs are batch jobs.

trans-unit.source: You create a cluster and run some jobs.
trans-unit.target: You create a cluster and run some jobs.

trans-unit.source: In this section, you will create a Linux-based Hadoop cluster in HDInsight using [Azure ARM template](../resource-group-template-deploy.md).
trans-unit.target: In this section, you will create a Linux-based Hadoop cluster in HDInsight using [Azure ARM template](../resource-group-template-deploy.md).

trans-unit.source: The Azure ARM template experience is not required for following this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: The Azure ARM template experience is not required for following this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: For other cluster creation methods and understanding the settings, see [Create HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters.md).
trans-unit.target: For other cluster creation methods and understanding the settings, see [Create HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about using ARM template to create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight, see [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using ARM templates](hdinsight-hadoop-create-windows-clusters-arm-templates.md)
trans-unit.target: For more information about using ARM template to create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight, see [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using ARM templates](hdinsight-hadoop-create-windows-clusters-arm-templates.md)

trans-unit.source: Click the following image to open an ARM template in the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: Click the following image to open an ARM template in the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: The ARM template is located in a public blob container.
trans-unit.target: The ARM template is located in a public blob container.

trans-unit.source: From the **Parameters** blade, enter the following:
trans-unit.target: From the **Parameters** blade, enter the following:

trans-unit.source: **ClusterName**: Enter a name for the Hadoop cluster that you will create.
trans-unit.target: **ClusterName**: Enter a name for the Hadoop cluster that you will create.

trans-unit.source: **ClusterStorageAccountName**: Each cluster has an Azure Blob storage account dependency.
trans-unit.target: **ClusterStorageAccountName**: Each cluster has an Azure Blob storage account dependency.

trans-unit.source: After you delete a cluster, the data retains in the storage account.
trans-unit.target: After you delete a cluster, the data retains in the storage account.

trans-unit.source: **Cluster login name and password**: The default login name is **admin**.
trans-unit.target: **Cluster login name and password**: The default login name is **admin**.

trans-unit.source: **SSH username and password**: The default username is **sshuser**.
trans-unit.target: **SSH username and password**: The default username is **sshuser**.

trans-unit.source: You can rename it.
trans-unit.target: You can rename it.

trans-unit.source: Other parameters are optional.
trans-unit.target: Other parameters are optional.

trans-unit.source: You can leave them as they are.
trans-unit.target: You can leave them as they are.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK** to save the parameters.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK** to save the parameters.

trans-unit.source: From the **Custom deployment** blade, click **Resource group** dropdown box, and then click **New** to create a new resource group.
trans-unit.target: From the **Custom deployment** blade, click **Resource group** dropdown box, and then click **New** to create a new resource group.

trans-unit.source: The resource group is a container that groups the cluster, the dependent storage account and other linked resource.
trans-unit.target: The resource group is a container that groups the cluster, the dependent storage account and other linked resource.

trans-unit.source: Click **Legal terms**, and then click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Legal terms**, and then click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: You will see a new tile titled **Submitting deployment for Template deployment**.
trans-unit.target: You will see a new tile titled **Submitting deployment for Template deployment**.

trans-unit.source: It takes about around 20 minutes to create a cluster.
trans-unit.target: It takes about around 20 minutes to create a cluster.

trans-unit.source: Once the cluster is created, you can click the cluster blade in the portal to open it.
trans-unit.target: Once the cluster is created, you can click the cluster blade in the portal to open it.

trans-unit.source: After you complete the tutorial, you might want to delete the cluster.
trans-unit.target: After you complete the tutorial, you might want to delete the cluster.

trans-unit.source: With HDInsight, your data is stored in Azure Storage, so you can safely delete a cluster when it is not in use.
trans-unit.target: With HDInsight, your data is stored in Azure Storage, so you can safely delete a cluster when it is not in use.

trans-unit.source: You are also charged for an HDInsight cluster, even when it is not in use.
trans-unit.target: You are also charged for an HDInsight cluster, even when it is not in use.

trans-unit.source: Since the charges for the cluster are many times more than the charges for storage, it makes economic sense to delete clusters when they are not in use.
trans-unit.target: Since the charges for the cluster are many times more than the charges for storage, it makes economic sense to delete clusters when they are not in use.

trans-unit.source: For the instructions of deleting a cluster, see [Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using the Azure Portal](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#delete-clusters).
trans-unit.target: For the instructions of deleting a cluster, see [Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using the Azure Portal](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#delete-clusters).

trans-unit.source: Run Hive queries
trans-unit.target: Run Hive queries

trans-unit.source: [Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md) Views provide several utilities through a web page.
trans-unit.target: [Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md) Views provide several utilities through a web page.

trans-unit.source: One of the utilities is Hive view.
trans-unit.target: One of the utilities is Hive view.

trans-unit.source: In this section, you'll use the Hive view to run Hive queries on your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you'll use the Hive view to run Hive queries on your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For other methods to run Hive queries, see [Use Hive in HDInsight](hdinsight-use-hive.md).
trans-unit.target: For other methods to run Hive queries, see [Use Hive in HDInsight](hdinsight-use-hive.md).

trans-unit.source: Browse to **https://<ClusterName>.azurehdinsight.net**, where <ClusterName> is the cluster you created in the previous section to open Ambari.
trans-unit.target: Browse to **https://<ClusterName>.azurehdinsight.net**, where <ClusterName> is the cluster you created in the previous section to open Ambari.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Hadoop username and password that you specified in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Hadoop username and password that you specified in the previous section.

trans-unit.source: The default username is **admin**.
trans-unit.target: The default username is **admin**.

trans-unit.source: Open **Hive View** as shown in the following screenshot:
trans-unit.target: Open **Hive View** as shown in the following screenshot:

trans-unit.source: ![Selecting ambari views](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started/selecthiveview.png).
trans-unit.target: ![Selecting ambari views](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-linux-tutorial-get-started/selecthiveview.png).

trans-unit.source: In the __Query Editor__ section of the page, paste the following HiveQL statements into the worksheet:
trans-unit.target: In the __Query Editor__ section of the page, paste the following HiveQL statements into the worksheet:

trans-unit.source: Click __Execute__.
trans-unit.target: Click __Execute__.

trans-unit.source: A __Query Process Results__ section should appear beneath the Query Editor and display information about the job.
trans-unit.target: A __Query Process Results__ section should appear beneath the Query Editor and display information about the job.

trans-unit.source: Once the query has finished, The __Query Process Results__ section will display the results of the operation.
trans-unit.target: Once the query has finished, The __Query Process Results__ section will display the results of the operation.

trans-unit.source: You shall see one table called **hivesampletable**.
trans-unit.target: You shall see one table called **hivesampletable**.

trans-unit.source: This sample Hive table comes with all the HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: This sample Hive table comes with all the HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] Note the __Save results__ dropdown in the upper left of the __Query Process Results__ section; you can use this to either download the results, or save them to HDInsight storage as a CSV file.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] Note the __Save results__ dropdown in the upper left of the __Query Process Results__ section; you can use this to either download the results, or save them to HDInsight storage as a CSV file.

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 4 and step 5 to run the following query:
trans-unit.target: Repeat step 4 and step 5 to run the following query:

trans-unit.source: After you have completed a Hive job, you can [export the results to Azure SQL database or SQL Server database](hdinsight-use-sqoop-mac-linux.md), you can also [visualize the results using Excel](hdinsight-connect-excel-power-query.md).
trans-unit.target: After you have completed a Hive job, you can [export the results to Azure SQL database or SQL Server database](hdinsight-use-sqoop-mac-linux.md), you can also [visualize the results using Excel](hdinsight-connect-excel-power-query.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about using Hive in HDInsight, see [Use Hive and HiveQL with Hadoop in HDInsight to analyze a sample Apache log4j file](hdinsight-use-hive.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about using Hive in HDInsight, see [Use Hive and HiveQL with Hadoop in HDInsight to analyze a sample Apache log4j file](hdinsight-use-hive.md).

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you have learned how to create a Linux-based HDInsight cluster using an ARM template, and how to perform basic Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you have learned how to create a Linux-based HDInsight cluster using an ARM template, and how to perform basic Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about analyzing data with HDInsight, see the following:
trans-unit.target: To learn more about analyzing data with HDInsight, see the following:

trans-unit.source: To learn more about using Hive with HDInsight, including how to perform Hive queries from Visual Studio, see [Use Hive with HDInsight][hdinsight-use-hive].
trans-unit.target: To learn more about using Hive with HDInsight, including how to perform Hive queries from Visual Studio, see [Use Hive with HDInsight][hdinsight-use-hive].

trans-unit.source: To learn about Pig, a language used to transform data, see [Use Pig with HDInsight][hdinsight-use-pig].
trans-unit.target: To learn about Pig, a language used to transform data, see [Use Pig with HDInsight][hdinsight-use-pig].

trans-unit.source: To learn about MapReduce, a way to write programs that process data on Hadoop, see [Use MapReduce with HDInsight][hdinsight-use-mapreduce].
trans-unit.target: To learn about MapReduce, a way to write programs that process data on Hadoop, see [Use MapReduce with HDInsight][hdinsight-use-mapreduce].

trans-unit.source: To learn about using the HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio to analyze data on HDInsight, see [Get started using Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn about using the HDInsight Tools for Visual Studio to analyze data on HDInsight, see [Get started using Visual Studio Hadoop tools for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-visual-studio-tools-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: If you're ready to start working with your own data and need to know more about how HDInsight stores data or how to get data into HDInsight, see the following:
trans-unit.target: If you're ready to start working with your own data and need to know more about how HDInsight stores data or how to get data into HDInsight, see the following:

trans-unit.target: For information on how HDInsight uses Azure blob storage, see [Use Azure Blob storage with HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-use-blob-storage.md).

trans-unit.source: For information on how to upload data to HDInsight, see [Upload data to HDInsight][hdinsight-upload-data].
trans-unit.target: For information on how to upload data to HDInsight, see [Upload data to HDInsight][hdinsight-upload-data].

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to learn more about creating or managing an HDInsight cluster, see the following:
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to learn more about creating or managing an HDInsight cluster, see the following:

trans-unit.source: To learn about managing your Linux-based HDInsight cluster, see [Manage HDInsight clusters using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn about managing your Linux-based HDInsight cluster, see [Manage HDInsight clusters using Ambari](hdinsight-hadoop-manage-ambari.md).

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the options you can select when creating an HDInsight cluster, see [Creating HDInsight on Linux using custom options](hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn more about the options you can select when creating an HDInsight cluster, see [Creating HDInsight on Linux using custom options](hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with Linux, and Hadoop, but want to know specifics about Hadoop on the HDInsight, see [Working with HDInsight on Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-information.md).
trans-unit.target: If you are familiar with Linux, and Hadoop, but want to know specifics about Hadoop on the HDInsight, see [Working with HDInsight on Linux](hdinsight-hadoop-linux-information.md).

trans-unit.source: This provides information such as:
trans-unit.target: This provides information such as:

trans-unit.source: URLs for services hosted on the cluster, such as Ambari and WebHCat
trans-unit.target: URLs for services hosted on the cluster, such as Ambari and WebHCat

trans-unit.source: The location of Hadoop files and examples on the local file system
trans-unit.target: The location of Hadoop files and examples on the local file system

trans-unit.source: The use of Azure Storage (WASB) instead of HDFS as the default data store
trans-unit.target: The use of Azure Storage (WASB) instead of HDFS as the default data store
